data.name: Hand with hand
data.detailed_description:
When the notorious predator spacecraft in the universe was about to leave after the plundering, an unknown situation occurred and fell. All kinds of different dimensional collection boxes captured on the spacecraft are scattered all over the world. More than 300 girls are waiting for you to rescue. The rescuers launched an action code named 'SaveHer.' Some rescuers can't face the temptation and become zombies. Your challenge becomes more arduous...

Note: before entering the next level or starting this level again, you need to press ESC to choose to save the game so as not to start collecting again.
Note: All pictures in the game are drawn by artificial intelligence.

Player controller
Forward: W
Back: S
Left: A
Right: D
Switch weapons: digital key 12
Open box / pick up a weapon: long press F
Throwing weapons: Q and E
Save people: close to the illuminant and press N
View people who have been saved: J
Sprint：Left Shift

Update：

v1.1
Add 100 rescued girls, and the images of girls are 500.
Reduce storage space.

v1.0
100 rescued persons were added, bringing the total number of people waiting to be rescued to 400.
Fix known bugs.

data.short_description: 'SaveHer' is a shooting collection type of game. You need to break through the obstacles and explore all kinds of dangerous places. You will get all kinds of guns to save the girls trapped in different dimensions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
